posts.message: Create an API for your ready running ROR APP via grape
posts.caption: toptal.com
posts.description: In this tutorial, Toptal Engineer Orban Botond demonstrates how to use the Grape gem -- a REST-like API micro-framework for Ruby -- to build backend support in Rails for a JSON API.

posts.message: What is the best tool to handle a big data and analyzing it? I have a huge amount of raw text data and I want to find out the most used words and some statistics .. posts.message:
While reading Code Complete book, I saw this great paragraph about distinction between programming in a language vs. programming into a language.

"Programmers who program “in” a language limit their thoughts to constructs that the language directly supports. If the language tools are primitive, the programmers thoughts will be also be primitive.

Programmers who program “into” a language, first decide what thoughts they want to express, and then they determine how to express thoughts using the tools provided by their specific language."

I have been working with CSS for nearly 13 years and this is the first time I see that pipe attribute selector. Interesting explanation between the difference between it and the caret selector and some real live examples.
posts.caption: stackoverflow.com
posts.description: As w3schools declare both | and ^ select attribute starting with a defined value So what's the difference?
